Blocked out Land Within Gated Community in Hakgala
column6: Residential Land in the tranquil hills of Hakgala (Central Province) ~ Elevation: 2,169m | Avg. Climate: Temperate weather with sun shine all year round. Scenic surroundings ~ majestic misty mountains and scenic views of the Uva Province and to the East Horton Plains National Park and myriad waterfalls (Bambarakanda). Closest towns: Visit lush vegetable gardens of Seetha Eliya - 5min (4.2km), Nuwara Eliya a.k.a. ‚ÄúLittle England‚Äù for the old world charm of English architecture in colonial times - 11min (7km), the serenity of English gardens and manicured lawns at the Hakgala Botanical Gardens ‚Äì 3min (1.8km). Also of high commercial value. Other sights in proximity: Nuwara Eliya Race Course (seasonal equestrian sports and showmanship contests), Victoria Park and Museum named after Queen Victoria of England, Pitdurutalagala Mountains (Nature & trekking), Lover‚Äôs Leap Waterfall in Hawa Eliya, Pedro Tea Factory (a 19 Century authentic display of tea manufacture), Ambewela Dairy Farm, the old British railways in Radella and Nanu Oya are some of the popular sights in proximity of the land.
